name: Cheesy Tomato Pasta
steps: Boil pasta until al dente.
Sauté garlic and tomatoes in olive oil.
Add cheese and mix with pasta.
Garnish with herbs and serve hot.

name: Veggie Sandwich
steps: Toast bread slices.
Layer with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Spread mayonnaise and close sandwich.
Cut and serve with ketchup.

name: Fruit Salad Delight
steps: Chop all fruits into bite-sized pieces.
Mix in a bowl and drizzle honey.
Chill for 30 minutes.
Serve fresh with mint leaves.

name: Spicy Paneer Wrap
steps: Sauté paneer with onion, capsicum, and spices.
Place mixture in tortilla and roll tightly.
Grill for 2 minutes.
Serve with chutney or dip.

name: Chocolate Mug Cake
steps: Mix all ingredients in a mug.
Microwave for 90 seconds.
Let it cool slightly.
Top with chocolate chips or syrup.

name: Masala Omelette
steps: Beat eggs and mix with chopped veggies and spices.
Pour into hot pan and cook both sides.
Fold and serve with toast.

name: Classic Lemonade
steps: Squeeze lemon juice into a jug.
Add sugar and water, stir well.
Add mint leaves and ice.
Serve chilled.

name: Corn Chaat
steps: Boil sweet corn.
Mix with chopped veggies and spices.
Squeeze lemon juice.
Serve in bowls with coriander garnish.

name: Mango Smoothie
steps: Blend mango, milk, and sugar until smooth.
Add ice cubes and blend again.
Pour into glasses and serve cold.

name: Garlic Butter Rice
steps: Cook rice and keep aside.
Sauté garlic in butter.
Mix rice with garlic butter.
Season with salt and pepper.
